statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE current_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE restock_threshold < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE current_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name FROM product_inventory ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE current_quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE current_quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity, restock_threshold FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY current_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE current_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE restock_threshold > 20 AND current_quantity < 10 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM restock_history ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sum(restock_quantity) AS total_restock FROM products JOIN restock_history ON products.product_id = restock_history.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, restock_date FROM products JOIN restock_history ON products.product_id = restock_history.product_id;
SELECT * FROM restock_history WHERE restock_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM ProductInventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, threshold_stock FROM ProductInventory ORDER BY threshold_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, threshold_stock FROM ProductInventory WHERE current_stock < threshold_stock;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM ProductInventory WHERE current_stock < threshold_stock;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM ProductInventory JOIN Sales ON ProductInventory.product_id = Sales.product_id;
SELECT Sale_id, Quantity_sold, Product_name, Sale_date FROM Sales JOIN ProductInventory ON ProductInventory.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE Sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Product_name, Quantity_restocked, Restock_date FROM ProductInventory JOIN Restocking ON ProductInventory.product_id = Restocking.product_id ORDER BY Restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_quantity, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.order_quantity, restock_history.restock_quantity FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN restock_history ON customers.customer_id = restock_history.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 20 ORDER BY stock_level ASC
SELECT product_name, stock_level, restock_threshold FROM products WHERE stock_level < restock_threshold
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers
